edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot

Class OTOnByteArraySMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.OTOnByteArraySMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OTSMsg, java.io.Serializable

    public class OTOnByteArraySMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements OTSMsg
    Concrete implementation of OT Privacy sender (on byte array) message.

    In the byteArray scenario, the sender sends two GroupElement - w0 and w1 and two byte arrays - c0 and c1. This class is used by most of OT implementations.

    An OT protocol that does not use this class (like OT SemiHonest) will create a separate class that matches what it needs.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
    See Also:
